revised_title: Anatomical Study of Myxinoids and Their Skeletal Structure
tldr: The author examines the skeletal structure of myxinoids, specifically Myxine and Bdellostoma, and compares it to other related types like Petromyzoids and Anura. The study focuses on the unique cartilage composition and cranio-facial structure of myxinoids, which provide insights into the evolution of the Vertebrata.
